summary: This mod adds a small mead hall south-east from Riverwood (up the hill towards the small bandit camp.) Inside there are 8 lore-friendly followers to help you on your journey.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod and I would really appreciate some constructive feedback.

This mod adds a small mead hall south-east from Riverwood (up the hill towards the small bandit camp.) Inside there are 8 lore-friendly followers to help you on your journey.

I recommend that you use UFO (Ultimate follower Overhaul) and AFT (Amazing Follower Tweaks) to help bring some life into the followers as they do not have any custom dialogue.

As far as I know there are no conflicts with any other mods, unless you have one that modifies the area around the mead hall.

If you have any follower requests or bug reports, feel free to comment and let me know.

Tweak combat styles of followers for AFT:

(Argonian) - Stone-Scales - Sword and Shield
(Imperial) - Marceline - Dual Swords
(Altmer - High Elf) - Viarah - Magic (non-specific)
(Orsimer - Orc) - Korgh Gro-Dushnikh - Two Handed
(Khajiit) - Laziime - Bow and Arrows
(Nord) - Hjorlund - Two Handed
(Dunmer - Dark Elf) - Gorath Lehm - Spell Sword
(Bosmer - Wood Elf) - Aernor - Ranger

I am now taking follower requests, if you would like a lore-friendly character made please specify the name, gender, race, a general idea of the facial features and the combat type. Or you can just give me the name and race and I will do the rest for you :)
author: Zobmondo
